text:
Broadway, at the East River, showing the toll house, vehicular entrance, slip and ferry of the Municipal Ferry to 23rd Street (Manhattan). This set, consisting of three views was taken at the same time. The bridge shown in No. 3 is the Queensboro.
March 24, 1931.
P.L. Sperr

Broadway, at the East River, showing the toll house, vehicular entrance, slip and ferry of the Municipal Ferry to 23rd Street (Manhattan). This set, consisting of three views was taken at the same time. The bridge shown in No. 3 is the Queensboro.
March 24, 1931.
P.L. Sperr

Broadway, at the East River, showing the toll house, vehicular entrance, slip and ferry of the Municipal Ferry to 23rd Street (Manhattan). This set, consisting of three views was taken at the same time. The bridge shown in No. 3 is the Queensboro.
March 24, 1931.
P.L. Sperr

The intersection of Metropolitan (right) and Maspeth Aves (left), at Bushwick Ave., showing in the foreground Woodpoint Park. This view is eastward and shows the towered structure of the Greenpoint Hospital on Skillman Ave.

July 23, 1937.

P. L. Sperr.
